articles.title: A devastating cotton virus lurked undetected in U.S. fields for nearly 20 years
articles.description: A damaging cotton virus thought to be a recent invader has actually been hiding in U.S. fields for nearly two decades. articles.description: Researchers studying cyanobacteria from hot springs in Thailand have discovered a new natural UV-blocking compound with impressive antioxidant power.
